channel.title: Removing WindowPanes
channel.description:
Is there a way to remove the Window Pane on a 525 server and the client will still log in without crashing. The Pane is set to 548, is there any other that makes the game screen full screen but stay the same size?
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/9a4906.png[/img]

item.title: Removing WindowPanes
